title: message display
content:
Suddenly my e-mails are showing in Thunderbird as tabs rather than listings. What have I done? How do I rectify it? I looked in display, and there didn't seem to be anything there to help me.

Thanks.
creator: BigMart

title: Issue with Thunderbird Account Setup - Credentials Not Displayed
content:
I am experiencing an issue while setting up my account in Thunderbird. After entering my email and password during the Account Setup process, the "Enter Credentials" window appears with a URL in the address bar. However, the window does not display any content.

I have attached a screenshot for your reference.

Could you please assist me in resolving this issue?

Thank you in advance for your help.

Best regards, Vasyl
creator: liams02413

title: Mozilla Log In, Google Email, "That's and Error" "That's all we know" Can't clear pop-up to proceed
content:
I am attempting to log in to a new Mozilla Thunderbird account. I am being asked to log in with Google. (I would rather not.) When I attempt to log in WITH Google credentials, I get the message above; PAGE SIZE Pop up from Google "That's an error" "That's all we know." I cannot proceed. I cannot clear the pop up without restarting.

That's it.

Thanks for your help.
creator: ThomCad3

title: All of a sudden we cannot send emails. We still receive them
content: Recently we found that while we can still receive email we cannot send or reply. What do we do?
creator: washley1

title: Text Color selection when composing email doesn't work
content:
Sometimes I want to change the color of a single sentence in an email I'm composing. I get the Color Selection from the menu, but the text color remains black. (I don't have this problem with any other software I use, including a couple of "ancient" software tools.)

Please advise.
creator: KJS-LES

title: Admit card download karne k liye
creator: user325471320347023093348348452507807755388

title: Mails verplaatsen naar submappen
content: Er kunnen geen mails meer verplaatst worden naar submappen. Oplossing ?
creator: antoon

title: Email window location
content: I upgraded yesterday from Linux Mint 20.3 to Linux Mint 21 with Thunderbird 115.18.0. Since then whenever I open an email the window is at top left of the screen and is partially obscured. I can move it easily, but new messages always default to the top left position, unlike the Thunderbird in Mint 20.3 where new messages defaulted to the last used position. Can I change this behaviour?
creator: cliffcoggin

title: impossible d'envoyer des messages depuis ma messagerie sur mon  ordinateur
content: Bonjour, Depuis quelques jours , sans avoir modifié les paramètres de ma messagerie sur thunderbird, il m'est impossible d'envoyer des messages depuis mon PC; le message dit: " Sender address rejected; not logged in. veuillez vérifier que votre adresse e-mail dans les paramètres de compte est correcte. Mon adresse est juste. Merci de m'aider à régler ce problème. AL
creator: annie.lapierre
